Name: C'est la Vie (That's Life)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated apple slice and star anise.
Garnish with dehydrated apple slice and star anise floated on surface.
Review: A tasty apple and cognac sour with delicate herbal and cinnamon spice.
History: Created in 2015 by Saverio Vicari at The Rib Room Bar at The Jumeirah Carlton Tower Hotel in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of C'est la Vie (That's Life) contains 188 calories
